name: The smallest number whose sum of proper divisors (aliquot parts) is the repunit number (10^n - 1)/9, denoted by R_n.
example: a(4) = 7721 because 7721 is the smallest number whose sum of proper divisors is R_4 = 1111.
program: (PARI) a(n) = my(k=1); while (sigma(k)-k != (10^n - 1)/9, k++); k; \\ _Michel Marcus_, Nov 16 2024
author: _Shyam Sunder Gupta_, Nov 16 2024
